description: Tankard, ceramic with pewter mounts, decorated with floral panels reserved on bluish white ground and surrouded by conventionalized floral bands in green, blue, yellow, and overglaze orange, German XVIIIc cat. card dims H 11'
text: Tankards, lidded drinking vessels, have been in use since the Middle Ages. The lid kept insects and dust out of one's beer between drinks.
title: Tankard
